thread.title: BRIEF-First Credit Finance Group Says Enhance Pacific, Best Year Enterprises Filed Writ Of Summons

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-First Credit Finance Group Says Enhance Pacific, Best Year Enterprises Filed Writ Of Summons

organizations.name: brief-first credit finance group says enhance pacific

text:
Jan 23 (Reuters) - First Credit Finance Group Ltd:
* ENHANCE PACIFIC LIMITED AND BEST YEAR ENTERPRISES LIMITED HAVE FILED A WRIT OF SUMMONS
* WRIT OF SUMMONS WITH INDORSEMENT OF CLAIM DATED 22 JAN AS PLAINTIFFS AGAINST CONVOY COLLATERAL, CSL SECURITIES
* PLAINTIFFS SOUGHT RELIEFS FOR MANDATORY INJUNCTION TO REQUIRE CSL SECURITIES TO DELIVER UP AGGREGATE OF 404.9 MILLION SHARES OF COâ€‹ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
